alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central DeKalb and central Fulton Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from Brookhaven to La Vista to Little Five Points, and moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Sandy Springs, Chamblee, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Druid Hills, Midtown, Virginia Highland, Sweet Auburn, Turner Field, Piedmont Park, Kirkwood, Brookhaven, East Lake, La Vista, Little Five Points, Atlantic Station, Chastain Memorial Park and West End. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
